dt: {bc}a loose granular material that results from the disintegration of rocks, consists of particles smaller than gravel but coarser than silt, and is used in mortar, glass, abrasives, and foundry molds
{bc}soil containing 85 percent or more of sand and a maximum of 10 percent of clay

dt.t: the {wi}sands{/wi} of this government run out very rapidly

dt: {bc}an oil-producing formation of {a_link|sandstone} or unconsolidated sand

et: Middle English, from Old English; akin to Old High German {it}sant{/it} sand, Latin {it}sabulum{/it}, Greek {it}psammos{/it}
shortdef: a loose granular material that results from the disintegration of rocks, consists of particles smaller than gravel but coarser than silt, and is used in mortar, glass, abrasives, and foundry molds
soil containing 85 percent or more of sand and a maximum of 10 percent of clay; broadly : sandy soil

dt: {bc}to sprinkle or dust with or as if with sand
{bc}to smooth or dress by grinding or rubbing with an abrasive (such as {a_link|sandpaper})

shortdef: to sprinkle or dust with or as if with sand
to cover or fill with sand
to smooth or dress by grinding or rubbing with an abrasive (such as sandpaper)
George 1804—1876 pseudonym of Amandine-Aurore-Lucie (or -Lucile)Dudevant née Dupin French writer

et: Middle English, probably alteration of {it}*samblind{/it}, from Old English {it}sam-{/it} half (akin to Old High German {it}sāmi-{/it} half) + {it}blind{/it} {ma}{mat|semi-|}{/ma}

dt: {bc}a tall rhizomatous North American grass ({it}Andropogon hallii{/it} synonym {it}A. gerardii{/it} var. {it}paucipilus{/it}) that is a dominant grass of the originally tallgrass prairies and is used for forage and as a soil binder {dx}compare {dxt|bluestem||1}{/dx}

shortdef: a tall rhizomatous North American grass (Andropogon hallii synonym A. gerardii var. paucipilus) that is a dominant grass of the originally tallgrass prairies and is used for forage and as a soil binder

dt: {bc}to make (a casting) by pouring metal in a sand mold

shortdef: to make (a casting) by pouring metal in a sand mold

dt: {bc}a casting made in a mold of sand

shortdef: a casting made in a mold of sand

dt: {bc}a fissure in the wall of a horse's hoof often causing lameness

shortdef: a fissure in the wall of a horse's hoof often causing lameness

dt: {bc}any of several Pacific flounders (genus {it}Citharichthys{/it} of the family Bothidae)

shortdef: any of several Pacific flounders (genus Citharichthys of the family Bothidae); especially : a common food fish (C. sordidus)

dt: {bc}any of numerous flat circular sea urchins (order Clypeasteroida) that live chiefly in shallow water on sandy bottoms

shortdef: any of numerous flat circular sea urchins (order Clypeasteroida) that live chiefly in shallow water on sandy bottoms
